title: Kim Kardashian serves body in leather trousers and taupe turtleneck
text:
Kim Kardashian West is back on her business woman grind, promoting a new SKIMS collection.

But she managed to make time Tuesday, amid the launch of the cotton collection, for lunch with sister Khloé.

Kim served body in a skintight look as she accompanied her little sister to Malibu Farm Pier Cafe.

Sister bonding: Kim Kardashian West served body in a skintight look Tuesday as she accompanied her little sister Khloé to Malibu Farm Pier Cafe

The 38-year-old stepped out in a snug brown turtleneck, which she tucked into matching leather pants, which hugged her signature Kardashian curves.

She completed the look with a pair of brown leather braided strappy stilettos, as they walked into the oceanfront restaurant.

Kim took to Instagram Monday in a busty display as she showed off her new SKIMS line.

The 38-year-old sat on the floor in the Polaroid as she sported a grey bra with matching joggers.

Serving body: The 38-year-old stepped out in a snug brown turtleneck, which she tucked into matching leather pants, which hugged her signature Kardashian curves

Hell on heels: She completed the look with a pair of brown leather braided strappy stilettos, as they walked into the oceanfront restaurant

She was promoting the shapewear line's cotton collection, which dropped Tuesday on the website.

Kim has recently been promoting the collection, which is inspired by the underwear and clothing she likes to lounge in.

Departing from the brand's typical evening wear undergarments, the new collection consists of jersey underwear, tank tops, t-shirts and other leisurewear.

Busty display: Kim Kardashian West took to Instagram Monday in a busty display as she showed off her new SKIMS line

Cotton collection: She was promoting the shapewear line's cotton collection, which dropped Tuesday on the website

Cozy chic: Departing from the brand's typical evening wear undergarments, the new collection consists of jersey underwear, tank tops, t-shirts and other leisurewear

Meanwhile, husband Kanye West has taken issue with her signature sex appeal, taking aim at her Met Gala look in this week's Keeping Up with the Kardashians.

He took a conservative stance on the look: 'You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy.'

But Kim stood her ground on the look: 'You built me up to be this sexy person and confidence and all this, and just because you’re on a journey and transformation doesn’t mean I’m in the same spot with you.'
description: Kim took to Instagram Monday in a busty display as she showed off her new SKIMS line. She was promoting the shapewear line's cotton collection, which dropped Tuesday on the website.
